meanings.definition: A Eurasian perennial herb (Delphinium staphisagria) with poisonous seeds.
meanings.sent1: The stavesacre plant in the garden has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The seeds of stavesacre are toxic if ingested.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the stavesacre seeds for nuts and had quite a surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like stavesacre seeds, poisoning the atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the stavesacre plant, for its seeds can be deadly.

meanings.definition: The dried ripe seeds of the stavesacre plant, used in medicine as a vermifuge and insecticide.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended using stavesacre seeds for pest control.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use stavesacre as a natural insect repellent.
meanings.sent3: The doctor jokingly suggested sprinkling stavesacre seeds around the house to keep bugs away.
meanings.sent4: The stavesacre seeds worked like magic, keeping the pests at bay.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of stavesacre seeds filled the room, warding off insects.
